rules_text:
Whenever one or more creatures block Haunted Breathstealer, defending player sacrifices one of those creatures.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, if there’s a card named Silence the Council in your graveyard and you both own and control Haunted Breathstealer, exile them, then meld them into Urborg Butcher.
rules_text2:
Haste, protection from black
Whenever one or more creatures block Urborg Butcher, defending player sacrifices one of those creatures.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you both own and control Urborg Butcher and a creature named Specter of Crosis, exile them, then meld them into Bane of the Burning Isles.
